name: parcel-test
description: A test of the parcel bundler for browser and node using pnpm package manager

scripts.node: parcel build index.js -d dist-node/ --detailed-report --log-level 3 --target node --no-minify && node dist-node/index.js
scripts.debug: parcel build index.js -d dist-node/ --target node --no-minify && node debug dist-node/index.js

author: Brent S.A. Cowgill
